name: Seven: The Days Long Gone

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Seven The Days Long Gone/Seven.exe

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Seven The Days Long Gone/Seven.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_35
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  UseGLSL: disabled
